medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 day prior to admission with nausea, multiple episodes of emesis, and blurred vision leading to bilateral vision loss. Two weeks after starting a new job, he also experienced lapses in memory and atypical behaviors.
medical_history.social_history: Patient started a new job as a materials handler at a propane company 6 weeks ago, where he had occupational exposure to propane and methanol.
